moreBlocks.articles:
• Our Criminal Defense Practice
    Our experienced lawyers use all appropriate legal measures in protecting your rights and seek to obtain the best possible results on your behalf. We are well-versed in the courtroom and have successfully handled many cases in litigation.
  • Our Personal Injury Practice
    Martin & Wallentine provides high quality legal representation to victims in serious injury cases in Kansas City and throughout Kansas and Missouri.
  • Our DUI Defense Practice
    Those who are facing the legal consequences of a DUI arrest should act quickly and contact an experienced and successful Kansas DUI attorney. Our firm focuses on DUI defense and has an impressive record in court.

description:
The attorneys with the Law Firm of Martin & Wallentine, LLC in Olathe, Kansas, have more than a decade of experience providing quality criminal defense, drunk driving, family law, civil litigation and personal injury services. We are by your side throughout the entire legal process and will advocate vigorously on your behalf.

When handling DUI cases, we rely upon a comprehensive knowledge of police intake and arrest procedures to investigate all possible lines of defense. If you have been charged with a DUI, our lawyers will do everything within their legal power to help you keep your license and avoid jail.

No matter your situation, we will use every tactic available to us to defend your rights. Our zealous attorneys will not stop fighting for you until every legal avenue has been explored and all options have been carefully considered. We believe in working collaboratively to achieve the best results possible.

At the Law Firm of Marin & Wallentine, LLC, we are selective with our cases and never take on more than we can handle. This means we always have the time to work with you one-on-one and conduct a thorough analysis of your situation. Whether you have been arrested for a crime or injured in an accident, our law firm has the know how to help you achieve a favorable legal outcome. We will visit you in jail, at home or at the hospital.
